website_summaries.verdict: This glass-top case is a great way to organize watches, cufflinks, bracelets, and other jewelry.
pros: In addition to black faux leather and a glass display top, this case has enough room for a dozen watches and space for more jewelry
This locking case holds 12 watches and has three color options
cons: Customers noted some imperfections in the faux leather, and the hinge lid does not remain open

customer_reviews.title: Great watch box
customer_reviews.text: Great watch box... however I needed to offset my large face watches to keep their Crowns from scratching the watches next to them.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Dombrowski

customer_reviews.title: Good for large watches
customer_reviews.text: I own over 25 watches, many of which are 50 to 52mm Invicta Reserve models. My old 10 watch case didn't have slots as widely spaced as this one and the watches would rub against each other no matter how you staggered them. This case allows you to put large watches next to each other if you stagger the cases at the top of the slot on one and the next one at the bottom of the slot. The drawer is good for cuff links, tie clips and pocket knives. I would buy another if I ran out of storage between this case and my 8 slot auto winder that has additional slots for 9 more quarts watches.
customer_reviews.author: Jay Ingram

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic Watch Organizer
customer_reviews.text: This is a great watch organizer. Each box has ample room, the largest diameter watch I have is 43mm but it fits with ease. The product was shipped in very well protected boxing. Everything is as described. The bottom drawer had more room that I thought. I fit my wallet, keys, business cards, extra watch bands etc in the bigger boxes, and there is still room for more. I would highly recommend this to anyone looking for a fairly inexpensive way to store/display your watches. I cannot speak to the longevity of the item, as I just barely received mine today, but it appears that under normal use it will hold up just fine!
customer_reviews.author: Rachel

customer_reviews.title: This was a wonderful product! My husband really liked it for our ...
customer_reviews.text: This was a wonderful product! My husband really liked it for our first anniversary. It is well made, masculine and I really liked the detailing of the white trim. I was even able to get it personalized with a engraved plate on the glass. I recommend this product 100%.
customer_reviews.author: Destini

customer_reviews.title: Everything I Could Have Hoped For.
customer_reviews.text: It came on it within 10 days like it said it would. everything was just like the picture except the earring holders were to small to fit in their slots. The case is almost as tall as a water bottle. Big bulky rings will not fit in the slot but will fit on the outside compartments. Overall I am very thrilled with this purchase and will buy it again soon
customer_reviews.author: Kierrea

customer_reviews.title: I love it. When I ordered it
customer_reviews.text: I love it. When I ordered it, I was little skeptical but when i opened it, I had angel signing around. It is a beautiful box and with great stitching lines. I loved the fact that it has glass to look through so you dont have to open it every time to show people your collection. It is light and doesnt take that much space. The only thing I would say is there should have been a provision to lock the drawer underneath the watch case. You can lock the box in a way that your watches are protected, but the pull out drawer is not locked!
customer_reviews.author: Tech Spec

customer_reviews.title: cheappppp leather (alibaba product?)
customer_reviews.text: i mean i knew this 1 was cheap but i went to take the made in china stick off the bottom and apparently the fake leather on here is not that thick cuz i just ripped it off with the sticker so luckily its on the bottom but huge dissapointment lol
customer_reviews.author: Gage Rockstar

customer_reviews.title: Great watch box for the price
customer_reviews.text: This is a fantastic watch box for any collector. The box has a really nice leather exterior with white stiching, which gives it a nice contrasting look. The lock seems durable, though I'm not sure how secure the locking mechanism is. Seems relatively easy to break into, but I haven't tried and let's be honest - if you have a really expensive watch, you won't be storing it in something like this. The watch pads are very nice and soft. Pretty standard but they seem to be made well. The extra storage is fantastic for storing rings, earrings, cuff links, tie bars, you name it. The lining is super soft and the separators are a nice addition.
customer_reviews.author: oydannyboy611

customer_reviews.title: Not bad at all. i tweeked it a bit.
customer_reviews.text: Item came fast and as described. i have big wrists and require an extra link usually on my metal braclet watches.... the watches look slightly loose in pocket because of that but i can okay with it. i personally dont like the white trim and i used black shoe polish to stain it. i whiped the polish off the box easily after dabbing thread using a qtip. im happy with the over all look. Not sure if the box will last forever but works very well for now. theres a lock and key to protect watches but if someone really wanted your watch... theyll get it out. lol. style wise.... i feel it showcases nicely.
customer_reviews.author: Calicalzero

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price
customer_reviews.text: A solid product for the price. The finishing isn't perfect but it's so inexpensive. For example, the drawer won't open just with a simple pull of the knob, you'll need to grab the sides and pull because it's too tight. The stitching isn't perfect in places, and of course the lock is not secure other than keeping a child out... All of which is expected and fine for the price. It certainly keeps my watches in place.
customer_reviews.author: David Eisenberg

customer_reviews.title: Yeah, this one is cool
customer_reviews.text: So I hate being disorganized. Nothing makes me more frustrated than having all my watches, tie bars, cuff links, and such strewn around my closet and room. This box has the versatility to hold everything. I'd buy another one.
customer_reviews.author: Raymond A. Rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: Simple and stylish
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice, sturdy watch and jewelry box. I had gotten tired of storing my watches in a cup and bought this to store them and other jewelry. It looks beautiful and I was able to store all my items easily. There really aren't any downsides to it other than there isn't a whole lot of storage for things like bracelets, and the watch storage isn't exactly suited for watches with a fixed band.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Great value, it looks good for the price
customer_reviews.text: This is an awesome product, I used it to put my watches, rings and chain. It has a rich leather look and it surprisingly came with a key! great gift for a gentleman with style. UPDATE..someone asked a question about their key not working, it was then that I tested mines and found out that the key doesn't work. Note: "THAT THE KEY DOESN'T WORK". took one star away..could be two.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not happy
customer_reviews.text: I paid for a new watch box, instead I got a used one. A few nicks and the outer material not lined up properly, but the worst part is the watch pillows were already imprinted with someone's else's watches. If you were like me and looking for a starter watch box don't buy this one.
customer_reviews.author: Mordred

customer_reviews.title: and it works wonderfully. It's nicely made
customer_reviews.text: I got this to store my Fitbit bands and the little jewelry I wear, and it works wonderfully. It's nicely made; I haven't had any issues with it at all. I waited a long time to purchase this because I wasn't sure if it would be right for me but I'm very glad I did end up buying it. I replaced my bulky jewelry box with this and a necklace hanger, and it looks very classy on my dresser.
customer_reviews.author: MurphsLaw

customer_reviews.title: Not for large watches
customer_reviews.text: Not for large watches ( a large watch in my opinion is 47mm or larger ). Should hold 44mm watches or smaller. Two 47mm watches touch when right next to each other. If your collection is only a few watches then you can space larger watches out. If you have several large watches look elsewhere. Not a terrible watch box. Bottom drawer is useful for storing straps and other tools
customer_reviews.author: Emac

customer_reviews.title: Have told my friends to consider buying this too
customer_reviews.text: This is one of the best things I have bought in a long time period it really has helped organize my jewelry. I love the fact that my watches are under glass and easy to say. This is also a great feature if you have a solar watch. Plus having room for all my jewelry below in the drawers is great this has lots of space and as a great way to get organized would highly recommend it
customer_reviews.author: John D

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Watch Holder!
customer_reviews.text: I got this watch box for someone as a gift and MAN THEY LOVED IT. This sleek watch box looks so elegant on the bedstand and has a clear top which keeps the watch from accumulating dust. The box is nicely organized with three different components and removable pads for adjustments accordingly.
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany D.

customer_reviews.title: If you own multiple watches, buy this box..
customer_reviews.text: This is a very nice product for the money. Anyone that has more than 5 watches should definitely buy this box. It comes professionally packaged to avoid damage but you cant truly appreciate this item until you unwrap it and start to put your time pieces in it.. The bottom draw can be used for rings but what I especially like, is the middle section of the bottom draw. You can use this section for links and pins for your watches. This product is well worth the money..
customer_reviews.author: Tim

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality! But....
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this back in June but the graduation got postponed til Aug. As I was getting ready to wrap this for a gift, I finally opened it to find the box was was already ripped. Ugh!!!! **Update: I emailed the seller and they agreed to send me a replacement. I was quite impressed with the quick response and willingness to make it right. I changed my overall rating and would buy from this seller again.
customer_reviews.author: EvaDiva

customer_reviews.title: Razor Display Case
customer_reviews.text: I collect Vintage and Modern Double Edge Safety Razors. I purchased this as a display case. With the watch cushions removed most of my Razors fit perfectly in the case. Only the long handle ones don't fit. the pull out drawer fits my Razor Blade supplies and other accessories. This is a very nice looking and very well built case. A great value for whatever your needs are.
customer_reviews.author: Rmaggi3019

customer_reviews.title: Good Value by 10 times more for flawless
customer_reviews.text: Great value for the price. Are there better boxes? Sure. All the whining haters out there, if you hate the quality or features, just spend around $1,500 - $3,000 for a flawless box, otherwise, these are holding my watches very well. Only small complaint I have is that if you have over 44 mm watches in general, you have to be very precise to fit the next to each other. Work around? I put my wife's small lady watches alternating them. All in all good value for the money.
customer_reviews.author: AG

customer_reviews.title: I cannot believe how nice this is for the price ($21 on an Amazon ...
customer_reviews.text: I cannot believe how nice this is for the price ($21 on an Amazon Flash sale). It really is a beautiful storage unit for your watch collection. Sturdy, solid, and quality feel all around. Also, this is one of most nicely packed items I have ever received from Amazon. It s practically gift-wrapped inside it's shipping box, and there is even a little "thank you" card enclosed. Would definitely recommend this watch box!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon_User_1969

customer_reviews.title: Very nice box
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a gift for my boyfriend. I had given him a very nice watch for Valentine’s Day and it kicked off an interest in different watches for him. He wanted to get something nice to store/display his watches in, instead of the box they came in. This really is a nice box; it’s large, sturdy and nicely made. The clasp works perfectly, the glass is nice and the storage drawer is an added feature he hasn’t quite figured out how to utilize, but is a nice touch. So far his watches fit beautifully and look great! Definitely recommend this box. It was packaged very securely also.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Piece for the Price!
customer_reviews.text: Love this piece! I am just beginning to build a watch collection that can fill this out, and it's a great display piece for the money. The drawer underneath the watch housing is the perfect place for a few accessory items (I can fit 3 collar pins, 1 collar bar, 2 sets of cuff links, a tie bar, and 3 colognes bottles of various sizes in the bottom).
customer_reviews.author: Millertime

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: This watch display box is great! I bought it because my husband has so many watches and they were just being taken up by his little cases that we purchased the watches in. So all the watches are on top and the bottom keeps all my finer jewelry in it perfectly! We even bought another one as a gift to someone else!
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Prieto

customer_reviews.title: Great Value for the price!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect box for all my watches and jewelry! I absolutely love it and for the price I couldn't believe the quality. Only negative that I could say is that the hinge for the lid is a little weak and doesn't really hold it open that well.
customer_reviews.author: Kwon Gotti

customer_reviews.title: Great buy for the price!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this watch case for my boyfriend who is also a cop. I love the 12 watch slots and the glass top. The lower drawer was perfect for all his pins and gadgets that go along with his job. This is perfect for keeping all of a man’s accessories in one spot! I noticed some of the stitching on the oval watch inputs is coming undone and the slot dividers inside the drawer are weak....so overall quality and material isn’t ideal but it still gets the job done!!! For the price you can’t beat it!
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Wow, this was a great buy.....
customer_reviews.text: Much better than I imagined. Read some reviews, most were good, some were bad. I did not know what to expect. I was very surprised when it came on how well it looked and was built. After gathering all my watches, I realized that I should have gotten a bigger one. I think you will be very pleased with this watch case. My only neg thing is that it takes two hands to open it up. You have to squeeze the latch together with one hand and lift with the other. But I can live. Great buy and I highly recomend.
customer_reviews.author: Jhon

customer_reviews.title: Great Watch Box Organizer
customer_reviews.text: They always say "you get what you pay for" but in this case I got a lot of value for money spent. This product was well packaged, very security conscious, done with care. It arrived earlier than scheduled via UPS and I was very excited to find the SONGMICS Watch Box 12 Mens Watch Organizer Jewelry Display Case Lock Keys Black UJWB012 was exactly as described. It is well made, handles large watches with no problems, ample room in lower pull out drawer for men's rings and accessories. The past reviews were dead on. Great vendor, 5 star value for the money, very happy!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Functional, clean, satisfied
customer_reviews.text: 1 year review! I purchased this 1 year ago, and it is still functional. No issues with the hinge. No "leather" peeling. Drawer opens/closes as it should. Plenty of space for both husband and wife to store items. Wife uses a separate box now, but it allowed her to store watches, rings, earrings, and certain daily jewelry here.
customer_reviews.author: ZEEBEE

customer_reviews.title: Very good quality and use
customer_reviews.text: This is a very good watch holder. I recommend this if you are like me and have more than one watch to choose from. The one slight thing I feel is wrong with this which is why I gave it 4 instead of 5 stars, is I feel it needs a small knob on the top to lift the lid for the watches after un-latching it. It is a little awkward to do without one. That is all. The quality is very good for a sub 25 item.
customer_reviews.author: M. Adelman

customer_reviews.title: This is a nice jewelry/watch storage box for the price
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice jewelry/watch storage box for the price. I like the fact that is has a clear plastic window so my solar powered watches can get the light they need to stay running. It has enough room to hold my large G-Shocks as well as a few fairly large dive watches. The bottom storage drawer is capable of holding plenty of rings, chains, and various other items as well. I am more than satisfied with this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: junkyard infidel

customer_reviews.title: Finally, It is possible to be organized
customer_reviews.text: This is just one of my many efforts to organize and optimize my life. Previously, my watches and jewelry were all over the place with no organized location to reside. Now, I come home and place my bracelets, watch and rings in the box. It makes me feel organized and creates a single location for my jewelry meaning I’m never left searching for a ring or bracelet last minute.
customer_reviews.author: KO-256

customer_reviews.title: I was worried it may not be satisfying
customer_reviews.text: I looked at many watch boxes because I was looking for something with low price but yet reliable, steady, and doesn't feel like cheap material. I must admit that I am very satisfied and happy with this product. It came clean and well mounted and secured. I also like that it has a draw in the bottom to put your sun glasses, cash, and rings. It is pretty good size. Each watch section is well spaced to fit big and small watches which I liked a lot because I was worried some my watches may not fit. I would definitely recommend this product to anyone who is wanting to buy a watch box. It's perfect. Thanks.
customer_reviews.author: Hood

customer_reviews.title: I like the style and design
customer_reviews.text: I like the style and design. I purchased this item for my ever growing watch collection (it holds my collection from 42mm to 50mm with no problem), with the lid closed. The ring section I use for my cuff links, and the bottom tray I use to lay out my leather dress watches. The only negative would be the lid, which does not always stay in place when opened (otherwise it would be 5 stars).
customer_reviews.author: Tony B

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Valet and Nice Size
customer_reviews.text: Looks as it does in the pictures. It arrived nicely wrapped and much better quality than expected. The hinge on the side doesn't seem to stand up as tightly as I'd like but the top does not close on its own. It could also be a loose screw I haven't checked. The lock only locks the top portion but the cushions are high quality to hold watches. The bottom drawer has removal separators as shown in the picture. My bf loves it and has already put a watch in it along with some cufflinks and collar stays.
customer_reviews.author: Spants

customer_reviews.title: Quality!!
customer_reviews.text: To my surprise this is a quality built product. It is sturdy and durable, the top is large enough that I do not have to worry about my crystals hitting the surface. I know those of you who are watch enthusiasts understand what I mean. I definitely recommend this product and the vendor. Oh did I mention how fast the delivery was.!
customer_reviews.author: CosmicRay

customer_reviews.title: Decent box for the money
customer_reviews.text: Only the lid locks (and of course it is more of a convenience thing to keep kids from snooping). The tension hinge that holds the top up is on the left inside, so the two watches on the left side might rub if they have large width. All of the watch slots fit about a 45 mm watch and anything larger takes a bit of care in adjusting so they don't rub against their neighbors.
customer_reviews.author: J.j.and.a

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: This was a fantastic buy for my husband. I can’t believe how cheap it costs for how well it is made and how nice it looks. My husband loves his watches and they are all on display for him to see when the kid is closed and all of his friends have complimented him on how nice the box is! It’s also great that it has the thin drawer underneath because my husband isn’t big on jewelry but he can store his cuff links and other small trinkets in there as well. I will definitely buy this again as a gift for a male family member or friend!
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Restaino

customer_reviews.title: Review of Songmics Black Leather Watch Box
customer_reviews.text: I gave this product 5 stars because it is a practical organizing tool. I love it! Being able to see through the clear top is a big plus. I purchased it for my significant other (who unbelievably owns 12 watches + a few rings, chains, and bracelets). BEFORE: Jewelry was sprawled across the length of the dresser (and drove me crazy). AFTER: The most beautiful, organized visual ever. Reviews are helpful and you really have to try this for yourself.
customer_reviews.author: Scubabarbie

customer_reviews.title: Love it, come in so handy
customer_reviews.text: Why is housing watches so expensive? Was hoping for a classy wood one, but a case just holding watches sell for over $100 easy, which is out of the question. Does the job, holds alot of watches, chains, rings, bracelets. I would buy again
customer_reviews.author: joe

customer_reviews.title: Looks good
customer_reviews.text: Product arrived as stated in the photo. Nice piece for the price. This is in no way a negative towards the company. If you, like me, have skinny wrists and have removed band links. They may not fit around the padding. Unless you squish them down like I did. I have another one of the from target but much smaller. This one is bigger and the same quality for lower price. So yeah it’s a great buy. Oh also super fast delivery. Like 48 hours.
customer_reviews.author: FoxxTop Contributor: Watches

customer_reviews.title: Great Product For Any Watch Lover
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my boyfriend because he loves wearing watches, but he has they lying around his room randomly. I gave this to him as a Christmas gift and he absolutely loved it. The lock was in good shape, which I was worried about based on a review I saw, and the materials inside and out were in perfect shape. Only downside is that I wish the second drawer locked along with the top drawer, as when it us turned on the side the drawer just falls out. Otherwise this is a great product that I am expecting to last for a long time!!
customer_reviews.author: alisa schutz

customer_reviews.title: Very masculine, attractive piece
customer_reviews.text: I love the lines, organization, and overall look and feel of this. Would by again. I'm not yet sure of the durability, but really, it's going to sit on my dresser....not go through a war.
customer_reviews.author: Ryanatorz

customer_reviews.title: 4 stars, but 5+ stars for value.
customer_reviews.text: For an inexpensive watch organizer, it is an excellent value. It is obviously not a $200 case, but it holds 12 watches comfortably, plus has a lower drawer for cuff links, rings, etc. Very pleased and would recommend for anyone more interested in functionality vs. high end materials/construction.
customer_reviews.author: F.C. Boston

customer_reviews.title: Came with marks
customer_reviews.text: The material of the box itself is nice but the surface came with marks and an indent already on it. The case width is also small so I can not put my large watches next to each other. Overall it looks decent but I hate that a beautiful set came already damaged.
customer_reviews.author: Zirconium

customer_reviews.title: Great addition to my watch collection
customer_reviews.text: While the box is compact it easily holds 12 watches. I like the glass lid that allows my two solar powered watches to keep their charge. It appears to be well made so I hope to have it a long time.
customer_reviews.author: capo

customer_reviews.title: Buy this
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a Christmas gift for my close friend. It’s a great quality product. He has it for over a year now and still looks the same. Like it so much I bought a watch only one for myself. Definitely get this, help with organizing your jewelry.
customer_reviews.author: LSCB

customer_reviews.title: Will save your marriage
customer_reviews.text: My husband loves watches. He collects them and picks one each day to match his outfit. At the end of the day he takes it off and sets it on the nearest surface. It drives me mad. There are always watches all over. And some of them tick. I got this watch box for him and he is finally putting them away each night! I think it saved our marriage.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: This organizer looks great and classy on our dresser. Fits all of my watches on the top, and the drawer has a good amount of space on the bottom drawer. The keys only lock the top watch part to my knowledge.
customer_reviews.author: knuckles42188

customer_reviews.title: Great box for the price
customer_reviews.text: After reading other reviews I was expecting to have at least 1 complaint with this box, but I was pleasantly surprised. There was no excess glue, no rip in the synthetic leather, no rust on the hinges. Overall I'm very happy. I had a hard time finding a box that was affordable and high quality (does such a thing exist?), but this box seemed to be better than most without the lofty price tag of designer cases. All of my watches fit nicely, including my 46mm case watches. The additional storage is nice, I can keep my wallet, pocket knife and other accessories well organized and accessible.
customer_reviews.author: Garret

customer_reviews.title: Worth it!
customer_reviews.text: Amazing!!!! This watch box is so nice good quality that I had to buy another one for my husband’s twin. It’s for their birthday but I had to show my husband the box couldn’t wait until his birthday next month and he loved it so I got one for his twin who has not seen it yet. (Just to mention it did not come with the personalized image I did both images myself with vinyl) but totally worth the buy! Perfect for gifting!!
customer_reviews.author: Andrea Alvarez

customer_reviews.title: Sophisticated
customer_reviews.text: This box is so classy and i mean really. It's so nice seeing it on my dresser, sitting there all sophisticated. Absolutely love it and would buy another again once my collection expands.
customer_reviews.author: TiahnaTop Contributor: Coloring

customer_reviews.title: Great way to organize my watches
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to organize my watches and looks great in my vanity. The bottom drawer keeps falling off whenever I move it though. I wish it had a latch too. Otherwise satisfied with the product.
customer_reviews.author: sri divya natta

customer_reviews.title: rks & Looks GREAT
customer_reviews.text: what else can i say besides i am VERY VERY happy with the jewelry box! i don't have much (what guy does) but i have 2 watches that were gifted to me & a few Willis Judd magnetic bracelets sold here on Amazon & holds them nicely. i put each bracelet on a seperate holder this way i can easily see which on i want to wear before i go out! My ONLY complaint (have seen a few reviews mention this also) is that the top doesn't stay locked in the up position so you have to hold it while prcking up an item!
customer_reviews.author: Subvet733

customer_reviews.title: A great Watch Box
customer_reviews.text: This box is great! I collect watches and I need them protected. I've had this for about 1 year now and I thought I would review :) I would highly recommend it. No issues with it at all... I take that back, the only thing is the lid doesn't stay up. It always wants to fall down, so you have to hold it when you put something in or take out of the box. No biggie though for me. I still recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: Mark B.

customer_reviews.title: He loved it!
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my Watch loving husband. He was so excited. He filled it up immediately. The little watch pads make it seem fancy and it's very sturdy and well made. I recommended as gift for any man or woman I guess. gift!
customer_reviews.author: Carmen

customer_reviews.title: very classy and fits in well
customer_reviews.text: great display case the locking top is great to show what you have but also good enough so you dont need to worry about your watches going missing just wish the bottom drawer locked as well but what can I say still use and admire it on a daily basis
customer_reviews.author: jc1w

customer_reviews.title: Nice look for the dresser!
customer_reviews.text: Very nice watch case, but not the easiest to open. The two small side pins that release the glass door latch is somewhat difficult to get pushed in. Definitely not built for your oversized watches, and even some of your standard sizes are either touching or you have to maneuver to prevent them from hitting or touching. The storage is ideal for rings, money clip, and any miscellaneous items.
customer_reviews.author: Briana

customer_reviews.title: WELL WORTH THE MONEY & NICELY MADE
customer_reviews.text: Well worth the money & looks very nice on my dresser. Everything, watches, bracelets, tie bars & tie tacs, Change etc. with plenty of storage to keep things nice & organized.
customer_reviews.author: Joe Barbee

customer_reviews.title: Great Overall Value for the Watch Box
customer_reviews.text: Solid quality watch display case, however the latch on the front to open the case is a little difficult to squeeze to the side & open. Other than that slightly inconvenient design flaw its a great value.
customer_reviews.author: Bryan&Shelley

customer_reviews.title: Great Case For Jewelry
customer_reviews.text: Love it jewelry looks fantastic in the display wouldn’t buy any other case. Just wish the bottom part locked not only the watch section; reason for the loss of star.
customer_reviews.author: Roman Gwiazda

customer_reviews.title: Great watch box
customer_reviews.text: Product is of phenomenal construction. The sewing of the leather is strong. The leather is strong as well. The window is actual glass, not plastic. It is a solid product. I have had this product for 5 months and it has survived a move. My only issue is that if your watch is 44-46mm and is on the edge where the metal bar is, it will hit your watch. So make sure you move your larger diameter time pieces to the center. I don't have the issue with 42mm or below. Other than that, great product.
customer_reviews.author: J. Torres Jr.

customer_reviews.title: I love this!!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a birthday gift for my husband and he loves it! It arrived in perfect condition without any imperfections or scratches. The quality is above what I thought it would be for this price. I would absolutely without a second thought buy it again! The top piece is indeed glass, not plastic, as some people were asking.
customer_reviews.author: Kayladav21

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this as a gift for my husband. It arrived in perfect condition. In addition to the individual compartments for each watch, the bottom tray pulls out and allows for all kinds of storage. He has been storing cufflinks, collar stays, and miscellaneous smaller items in there. Overall, he is very happy with it and would recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: A. Wilken

customer_reviews.title: Jewelry/watch box
customer_reviews.text: This product is pretty amazing great size live departments durable hold lot of items giftable forsure you wont be disappointed the vaule for money is amazing grear deal
customer_reviews.author: Crystal

customer_reviews.title: Great looking highly recommend it
customer_reviews.text: Got it as a gift and like it a lot! I would definitely recommend this box to those who want a high level box to store and display your watches. It also has a very neat drawer to store pins cuffs jewelry
customer_reviews.author: Erik de Almeida

customer_reviews.title: Worth the buy for a novelty
customer_reviews.text: Does as intended. Would buy this again. Only issue I’ve ran into is a ring not fitting. Men’s class rings and bigger will have an issue sliding into ring holders on drawer. It may loosen up over time and there for fit but for the time being I forced it in to loosen it up and works fine. It has the clearance so no biggie. It’s not that big of a deal because I usually keep it off to the side in its own display case and prob will continue to do that. Clean looking, sturdy enough for regular use, and nice touch for bed side table. Drawer is a little finicky but gets the job done.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Brilliant product for the price!
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a replacement of my previous watch box and came across this. I bought it with average expectations (due to price) but it exceeded my expectations on every level: quality, looks practicality. I love it!
customer_reviews.author: Pawel

customer_reviews.title: Love this! Should have gotten the bigger one to add my things too! Lol
customer_reviews.text: My husband LOVES his watch case is really an understatement. He spent a lot of time organizing and rearranging his watches, lapel pins, and cuff links. I also put a few earrings in there to keep them safe. Lol.
customer_reviews.author: Deanna V.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Case
customer_reviews.text: Nothing to dislike about this watch box. The fabric (inside and out) is perfect. Not cheap looking at all. Perfect for storing watches and more with the pull out bottom drawer. Size is also perfect.
customer_reviews.author: adria mitchell

customer_reviews.title: Lovely jewelry box, even for women
customer_reviews.text: This is a lovely box, perfect for my watches at the top, even though I do have to leave the straps open since my womens' watches are smaller than the pillow size provided. No matter, this does not bother me because the box is just lovely and perfectly accommodates my other jewelry as well. I'm very pleased with the look and feel of the jewelry box in general. I have looked for women watch jewelry boxes such as this and there are just none! This works just fine.
customer_reviews.author: Merydith Endelman

customer_reviews.title: ... on my dresser and stored away in a very Perfect for storing away all the watching and other small ...
customer_reviews.text: Definitely reduced the clutter on my dresser and stored away in a very Perfect for storing away all the watching and other small accessories; cuff links, rings,collar strips and stray buttons. Even better that I just discovered eye glasses fit in the second drawer as well. More than enough room to tuck away accessory without taking up too much space on the dresser. Not sure we would have up to 12 watches so the cubby holes could be handy for other accessories if needed. Comes with keys....not really used though since it seems like a cheap key and lock. Very durable and sturdy design. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: great but huge
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product... my hubby insisted on getting it for his burgeoning watch collection... the drawer at the bottom is what sold him.
customer_reviews.author: J. Smith

customer_reviews.title: Nice box
customer_reviews.text: The box is a nice size and the watch cushions can be removed to add other items. The clear lid is not glass. This was disappointing as I was going to have the glass etched with a personal message.
customer_reviews.author: AMClark

customer_reviews.title: Nice watch box.
customer_reviews.text: This a wonderful watch organizer. The watch box is well built and good looking. The price is great! I highly recommend this watch box.
customer_reviews.author: WTH

customer_reviews.title: Worth the purchase!
customer_reviews.text: Bought then as my husband’s watch collection grew. He loves the case. The case has three compartments which is ample room for other items to be placed in the case as well. The material is nice too.
customer_reviews.author: Brianna

customer_reviews.title: Love this purhase. Would recommend
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a Christmas present for my husband. Looks stylish and easy to use. Good lagout for different items. Great way to display everything. Good material. Feels good quality. Good amount of storage space also. Would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Caz

customer_reviews.title: Looks great and is well constructed
customer_reviews.text: Looks great and is well constructed. The lid stays up by itself too which some of the other watch boxs I have had did not. One thing I didnt like, although not a huge deal, is that the watch spaces are a little thin. So if you have several large watches (approx 50mm and up) they may not go into slots next to each other without touching. Overall very happy with it and when I fill this one up I will be buying another one.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Long

customer_reviews.title: Great Buy
customer_reviews.text: My husband has been wanting a watch box. Gave it to him for as one of his anniversary gifts. He loved it! It's nice, durable and surprisingly had a lil weight to it, and for the price you cant bday it.
customer_reviews.author: DQ

customer_reviews.title: The box appears to be well built and designed. ...
customer_reviews.text: The box appears to be well built and designed. It is larger that I actually needed, but would rather get larger than too small.The only reason I gave it 4 stars was that the base was bowed in making it hard to close the drawer. Since I bought it for the watch portion and that portion was what I needed and it does what I bought it for, would by again if needed.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Handsome & efficient leather looking watch box w jewelry drawer
customer_reviews.text: It's really handy & efficient to have a watch box even for fashion watches, to keep them from being scratched by other jewelry. And the wide jewelry drawer below has nice sections for rings, a few bracelets and earings.
customer_reviews.author: 2CorgiMa

customer_reviews.title: Fancy Watch box
customer_reviews.text: I love this box . It looks expensive, it’s a bit heavy, which I like . I had no issues . Fast fast shipping . Fits my watches perfectly. Would buy again in the future . The only down fall is the little bottom compartment, it comes out completely and doesn’t have anything to be attached to like a clothes drawer does . But overall very satisfied
customer_reviews.author: Manuel

customer_reviews.title: Great bang for your buck
customer_reviews.text: I gotta say. Looks solid and well made. I was finally able to organize my watches which I have been keeping in my nightstand drawer for years. Looks neat, feels solid. Great buy for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie DeFreitas

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic watch box.
customer_reviews.text: Very classy watch box with room for even large watches (G-shocks, invicta, etc.) Looks great on top of a dresser or night stand. The glass top has actually allowed my eco-drive watches to maintain a charge in my sunny bedroom. Build quality seems very good, but the faux-leather finish will likely crack in time as it is quite thin.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Taheri

customer_reviews.title: Perfect.  Cant go wrong.
customer_reviews.text: I can't find anything wrong with this. For the price it can't be beat. It has a white stitching to contrast the Black "fake" leather covering the box. The box is extremely solid and feels a looks FAR more expensive than it is.
customer_reviews.author: blake

customer_reviews.title: Great Box!!
customer_reviews.text: This jewelry box is very well made. It comes packed well and wrapped. I like that the top of the box is see through, that is important when trying to decide quickly which watch to wear. The quality of the materials that this box is made of is high. I'm impressed with it. I was hoping it would be just a bit bigger though.
customer_reviews.author: RAVenous Beast

customer_reviews.title: Im very happy with this box
customer_reviews.text: Im very happy with this box. Not only does it hold my watches, they look great and the storage in the bottom is very nice. I'm able to keep everything on my night stand organized in one place. The quality is great and I don't see a single defect. I would definitely recommend to a friend.
customer_reviews.author: Bill

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful I love it
customer_reviews.text: This looks amazing and makes for a perfect gift for someone starting or someone who already has a watch collection.
customer_reviews.author: Lisbet Rivas

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful box
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my husband and I am very pleased with it. He also loved it.
customer_reviews.author: jrodriguez

customer_reviews.title: Cheap with plenty of room
customer_reviews.text: This box was on the cheaper price side. It has plenty of room. I don't expect it to last forever, but it does the job.
customer_reviews.author: Gary Uzonyi

customer_reviews.title: Happy Hubby
customer_reviews.text: One of the best gifts I've gotten my hubby! He's starting his watch collection and this was perfect. Also houses cuff links and lapel pins. I got the clear glass monogrammed for him as well
customer_reviews.author: funmiford

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase
customer_reviews.text: I'd buy it again. Great price, looks great. I have the 50mm watch faces so I have to leave a space in between some of them but I expected that to happen.
customer_reviews.author: Shawn T.

customer_reviews.title: Great watch box!
customer_reviews.text: Looks awesome. Feels well built. The only thing I would mention as a negative is that big watches (44 mm or bigger, which I do not own) my not fit well. And the left upper corner is partially blocked by the lid bracket. Not a big deal to me, but might be for others. I'm well pleased with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Susan Hall

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: This display case is well built.....holds twelve full size fashion watches with good drawer storage for rings and cuff links....also room for chains......it's great to see my collection not stuck in a drawer....highly recommend this case
customer_reviews.author: alan black

customer_reviews.title: very nice, recommend
customer_reviews.text: I gifted this to my fiance after buying him alot of watches and rings, I was tired of seeing them everywhere. He loved it
customer_reviews.author: MP

customer_reviews.title: Would buy again
customer_reviews.text: I got these for my nephews for Christmas and they are super nice very well-made very well put together would buy again
customer_reviews.author: Teresa Dial

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my boyfriend for his birthday. He absolutely loves it. He likes the material and how it was lined in white. The only downfall is the bottom drawer comes all the way out. SO there’s nothing to catch it from coming all the way out when you open the drawer. Other than that great for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Shonda Vanessa

customer_reviews.title: Great but hinge broke within first ten times opening it.
customer_reviews.text: I would have given it 5-stars but the hinge broke within the first 10 times opening it. Everything else is in an immaculate finish. Update: I initially had it rated 1-star due to a failure of the hinge. Since the review, the company reached out to me immediately to resolve the issue. That's the best type of purchase where the company stands behind their products 100% to deliver the finest products and to make the customer happy. Thank you Songmics.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Dahey

product_meta.title: SONGMICS Watch Box 12 Mens Watch Organizer Jewelry Display Case with Lock and Keys Black UJWB012
feature_bullets: TOP-NOTCH CRAFT: Made of quality black faux leather and soft gray velvet, this jewelry box is superexcellent to protect your beloved jewelry from scratch and damage

MULTI-FUNCTIONAL SHOWCASE: 12 watch slots with removable velvet pillows, 1 ring case, 2 stud earring cards, 5 more compartments for necklaces, bracelets, cufflinks, earrings, brooches and other jewelry
LARGE REAL GLASS LID: Real glass lid keeps your watches from dust, and offers you an open view of the displayed watches
NICE GIFT IDEA: With elegant appearance and considerate design, this watch case is great for personal use, shop display and home decoration
DECENT WATCH BOX: 12 3/4"L x 7 5/8"W x 5 1/8"H (32.5 x 19.5 x 13cm), please don't hesitate to contact us if anything is wrong with the product
